title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based MOOCs Sustained Engagement Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of gamification elements (badges, leaderboards, stories) on learning satisfaction with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop three or more MOOCs design frameworks applying the Expectancy-Confirmation Model (ECM) and Flow Theory.
Learners can measure the impact of interface design aesthetics (color, layout) on learning effectiveness using quantitative evaluation tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
